author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <Aquentson_twitter> Hi, are we expecting the deposit contract launch anytime soon now that the standard has been finalized?

author: jgm
content: Talking of the deposit contract: what is the rationale behind the derivation of `withdrawal_credentials`?  Specifically, what is the reason to not just use the public key of the withdrawal account?  Was this an early attempt at an address format, or are there security implications that require the public key to not be present in unhashed form?

author: huntingisland
content: where is the best place to get questions answered about the architecture of ETH2 phase 2?
